intro: From v-iterator version 1.0.6, AG grid is supported. To use AG Grid, you should install first.

default.heading: Basic Grid configuration
default.intro: In v-iterator, default AG Grid theme is 'ag-theme-balham', You can set 'agGridTheme' property, when you need to use different theme.

render.heading: Cell Rendering
render.intro: By using 'function' attribute in 'columnDefs' property, you can add v-iterator components with row dependency.
